text: Josh Brown (born January 5, 1988 in Willingboro, New Jersey) is an American rugby union player. He plays as a flanker and No. 8 for the Old Glory DC in Major League Rugby. ==References== Category:American rugby union players Category:New England Free Jacks players Category:Old Glory DC players Category:People from Willingboro Township, New Jersey Category:Sportspeople from Burlington County, New Jersey Category:Salisbury University alumni Category:Living people Category:1988 births
title: Josh Brown (rugby union)
